channel.title: How to make a 64 bit run?
channel.description:
Thats my 32 bit run, how can i make it where its 64 bit???
@echo off Title "C:/Program Files/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

item.title: How to make a 64 bit run?
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

@echo off
Title
“C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

Thats your fix

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a 64 bit run?

item.title: How to make a 64 bit run?
item.dc:creator: @T0xicsnip3r T0xicsnip3r
item.description:
@T0xicsnip3r wrote:

make it jre7 and tell them to download it… not all ppl even have jre so might as well make it 7 and tell them to download it…
if ur on a windows 7 computer go to ur C drive and open programfiles x86 and see if ur jre7 is in there. if it is edit your run file for client and make it say Program Files (x86)\Java

Read full topic
